name: Nightmare race
description:
Nightmare race is game in which you must collect all the elements to be able to save yourself.

Story

You are in a graveyard, not knowing what to do, you see various items and you know that something bad will happen if you don't collect them fast, you start your journey to collect these strange items.

Controls

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Esc to Pause game
